articles.author: Devendra Pandey
articles.title: Constant travel, ‘mental fatigue’ prompted Ishan Kishan to opt out of Test series vs South Africa - The Indian Express
articles.description: The Indian board had earlier issued a press release where it cited ‘personal reasons’ for Kishan opting out of the upcoming Test series.
articles.content: He has been constantly travelling with the Indian team, but gets a game only when one or more of the regulars are unavailable. This toil and uncertainty has brought mental fatigue, which prompted wic… [+2673 chars]
